They were far away from the base of their new allies when Dreaplague 
raised her voice.

Dread: So father, why those sudden suggestions? 

Tyrael looked at her with the darkest blue gaze he could muster. The 
daughter suddenly lost any mockery in her voice.

Tyrael: You wonder, do you? What about you, Darkangel? Do you wonder 
why I called for a truce? D0o you think I am weak? Or crazy?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel shakes his head, not liking the latest turn of events. He 
> leaps up, flying off with the Tripredacus. Darkangel remains in 
robot 
> mode, do to his injuries.
>

> > Tyrael: of course! For now though, we shall go back to base. 
Let's

> angry) 
> > back to base now!
> >

> intrigued, 
> > changes to chopper and follows her father.
